Class Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • Neuron

  • public abstract class Neuron
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract parent class to represent a generalized neuron in the neural network represented by the Network class.
    Since:
    December 25, 2017
    Author:
    rsyed0
    See Also:
    SigmoidNeuron, Perceptron, Network

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Neuron(int layer, int index, double bias, double[] weights)
      A parent class constructor to initialize all field variables based on given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract double eval(double[] sigma)
      A method to evaluate the output of the neuron based on the outputs of the previous layer, as well as the weights of the connections and the overall bias of the neuron.

      • eval

        public abstract double eval(double[] sigma)
        A method to evaluate the output of the neuron based on the outputs of the previous layer, as well as the weights of the connections and the overall bias of the neuron.
        Parameters:
        sigma - The outputs of the neurons in the preceding layer.
        Returns:
        The output of the neuron.
        Since:
        December 25, 2017
        See Also:
        SigmoidNeuron, Perceptron
